name: Sathaq Worm
description: A massive elemental worm with a strong constitution and notable durability, characterized by its impressive size and neutral evil nature.
memorable: Ability to swallow opponents, dealing ongoing internal damage.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting adventurers and incapacitate them.
relations: May be encountered in areas with earth or stone, often alone or guarding territory.
environment: Commonly found in sandy, muddy, or rocky terrains.
strengths: High hit points and strong melee attacks; can camouflage and debilitate foes.
weaknesses: Low dexterity and intelligence; limited agility in combat.
attacks: Performing multiple melee attacks, including a biting and grappling attack.
most_powerful_ability: Agonizing Aura that imposes disadvantage on attacks for nearby foes.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect movement effectively.
skills: Proficient in Perception, enabling it to notice hidden threats.
additional_information: Immunity to acid and poison damage.
Resists non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Can burrow undetected through earth and stone.
Advantage on Stealth checks in specific terrains.
Deals double damage to objects and structures with its Siege Monster ability.
test_queries: massive elemental worm that swallows enemies
earth burrowing creature with debilitating aura
neutral evil worm with high hit points
powerful melee worm that grapples foes
